column4: i have a problem in ubuntu 8.10, when i start a mpeg/mpg movie it starts and quits as the movie starts, anyone know what codecs i need to install? apt-get what? =)
did you install ubuntu-restricted-extras ?
no, i will do now
how with aptget?
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
it was already the newest version
do you also have w32codecs from medibuntu.org ? what format is the movie
still just quits
well not all mpeg work is this via totem or other
via mplayer and totem, when i use GNOME Mplayer it plays the sound
what about vlc and did you install the other codecs I told you to
no, i installed all vlc things, it also quits when i start a movie
just this particular file or all video in your possession
you have compiz running? how much ram and what other apps you have open
i dont think i have too much open
that is a big culprit for eating up ram, may want to get fusion icon to switch on and off when not watching movies
fusion icon ?
it is a applet that lets you turn compiz on and off from your panel
i understand, but how do i get that switch in my panel?
try the backtrack support channel. it's not supported here
www.ubuntu.com get the iso and burn to cd or usb stick
